Title: Beyond Re-Animator
Writer: José Manuel Gómez (screenplay), H.P. Lovecraft (characters), Miguel Tejada-Flores (story)
Actors: Jeffrey Combs, Tommy Dean Musset, Jason Barry, Bárbara Elorrieta
Plot: Everyone's favorite mad scientist Herbert West is currently in jail after having state's evidence turned against him by his former assistant, Dan Cain. While being led away, some re-agent falls from his pocket where it is picked up by a young man who was camping nearby. The young man finds Herbert down in his jail cell and learns for himself just what the re-agent is capable of.
